111 Gregory Hall
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harold:
Enclosed is a memo of my expenses on my recent trip
to meet with the DAVI Television Committee* Let me
say first off that this may prove the most worthwhile
trip I will take* I went down on Sunday evening and
met with the Television Committee under the chairman¬
ship of Ray Wiman at 9:00 on Monday morning. I found
that the committee was considering an invitational
seminar to be financed either from DAVI funds or joint¬
ly with some money to be available under title VII.
Their deadline for this seminar is late summer or
early fall I960. The purpose of the seminar will be
to develop and write a booklet on the use of television
in classrooms•
The DAVI Television Committee's reaction to our utili¬
zation kit project was very good. They could see how
the kits were needed and they had no plans to develop
a similar type of material. To plan a seminar there
will be a steering committee meeting held May 2 and 3
immediately preceding the IERT in Columbus. At this
time, plans for the invitational seminar will be firmed
up. I should mention that this invitational seminar
will be largely aimed towards using experienced class¬
room teachers and the NEA Department of Classroom
Teachers is working with DAVI in the planning of this
seminar. Miss Anita Ruffing, Vice President of the
Classroom Teachers Department, met with us in Cincinnati
and will be meeting with us in Columbus •
John W. Seeger
Neil Sherburne
Loring M. Staples
Harold E. Wood
